unknown-input-replies.1: Hark, this does not make sense to me! Ask something worth my time!
unknown-input-replies.2: I am not sure of this! I must consult my council before I could answer this. For the time being let us talk of something else
unknown-input-replies.3: What purpose do you come here for? Are you trying to waste my time! Ask me something else...
unknown-input-replies.4: This is not befit the status of an emperor... Let us talk of something else!
unknown-input-replies.5: I am not appeased by this conversation. Let us switch this topic now.
